description:
For those times the trail bites back, this little pump will have your chunky tires topped up and ready to ride in no time. With its compact design and up to 90PSI of pressure, the Sport Drive HV (High Volume) is a worthwhile addition to your kit.

  • Overlapping design contains a flexible hose for easy pumping
  • Threads onto both Schraeder and Presta valves
  • Machined aluminum barrel and piston keep weight low and strength high
  • Pumps up to 90psi
  • Bottle cage frame mount included
name: Lezyne Sport Drive HV Pump
